QuestData.Title: Casting Doubt
QuestData.Description:
<A note has been left here for Kel'Thuzad. It does not appear that he has read it.>
Baron, I do not trust your new favorite acolyte. Something has been off about them ever since they returned from their ritual with the Kyrian remains.
Your work is too important to allow such discrepancies. The acolyte should be disposed of.
Faithfully,
Sorcerer Vutral
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: A necromancer whose suspicions could unravel your plans in the House of Rituals.
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat Sorcerer Vutral in the Vault of Souls.
QuestData.RewardText: <Sorcerer Vutral has been silenced, and with him the suspicions of your ruse.>
